body.p: This is different from the requirements of IAS 36 for the allocation of an impairment loss arising on a cash‑generating unit. IAS 36 requires an impairment loss on a cash‑generating unit to be allocated first to reduce the carrying amount of goodwill and then to reduce pro rata the carrying amounts of the other assets in the unit.
